verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>: From the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%>, <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, <S%H2704>Hazar-enan<s%> at the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, (and they shall have their <S%H6285>sides<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> and <S%H3220>west<s%>,) <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H836>Asher<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.

And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, shall be the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> which ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and in <S%H753>length<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>: and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the midst of <S%H8432>it<s%>.

The <S%H8641>oblation<s%> that ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds in <S%H753>length<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>.

And for <S%H3548>these<s%>, even for the priests, shall be the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>: toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3220>length<s%>, and toward the west <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>: and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

It shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that are <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, that have <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, that went not <S%H8582>astray<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%>, as the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%>.

And it shall be unto them an <S%H8642>oblation<s%> from the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

And <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall have <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>: all the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> none of <S%H4171>it<s%>, nor exchange <S%H7225>it<s%>, nor shall the first-fruits of the <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5674>alienated<s%>; for it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, shall be for <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H5892>use<s%>, for the city, for <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> and for <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

And these shall be the <S%H4060>measures<s%> <S%H6828>thereof<s%>: the north <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall have <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>: toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%>, <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>, shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>; and it shall be <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>; and the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof shall be for <S%H3899>food<s%> unto them that <S%H3498>labor<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And they that <S%H5647>labor<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall till <S%H5647>it<s%>.

All the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> by <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>: ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H7243>four-square<s%>, with the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>, on the one side and on the other of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>; in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>, and <S%H3220>westward<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>, <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto the <S%H2506>portions<s%>, it shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>: and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

Moreover from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, being in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of that which is the <S%H5387>prince<s%>'s, between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, it shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>.
And as for the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>: from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, one <S%H259>portion<s%>.

And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be even from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> unto the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meribath<s%> - <S%H6946>kadesh<s%>, to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H1419>Egypt<s%>, unto the great <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

This is the <S%H776>land<s%> which ye shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> by lot unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and these are their several <S%H4256>portions<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8444>egresses<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: On the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds by <S%H4060>measure<s%>;

and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be after the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>: the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>.

And at the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>reeds<s%>, and three <S%H8179>gates<s%>: even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>.

And at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds by <S%H4060>measure<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%>: the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>.

At the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>reeds<s%>, with their three <S%H8179>gates<s%>: the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>.

It shall be <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds round <S%H5439>about<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3074>be<s%>, Jehovah is there.
